_source.short_desc: Karbon is a collaborative practice management platform for accounting firms.
_source.long_desc:
Karbon is the collaborative practice management platform for accounting firms. It brings your team, clients, systems, and data together in one place, significantly improving visibility, efficiency, and connectivity no matter where your people are located.

Karbon is cloud-native, frequently updated, highly configurable and a delight to use. Firms running on Karbon are better equipped to drive the success of their business and the prosperity of their clients.
_source.pricing_details: Karbon has three different pricing plans with the most popular one being Business. Karbon offers an annual and monthly subscription. It starts at $59/month if billed annually, or $75/month if billed monthly.
_source.target_audience: Karbon is designed for accounting firms and is built to solve the specific needs and challenges within a modern accounting practice.

category_features.name: Approval Workflow
category_features.definition: Route documents and other data through one or more stakeholders for review and approval

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Client Management
category_features.definition: Manage company interactions with current customers

category_features.name: Client Portal
category_features.definition: A website and login for stakeholders to access information

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Due Date Tracking
category_features.definition: Ability to identify, sort on and alert participating parties about the approaching date by which action has to be taken

category_features.name: For CPA Firms
category_features.definition: Software specialized for certified public accountants (financial advisors) who help outside entities reach financial goals

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Staff Management
category_features.definition: Schedule shifts for staff/employees, track hours worked, and manage staff payroll

category_features.name: Time Tracking
category_features.definition: Measure time to completion or hours worked

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (Save Up to 40%) is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Powerful and flexible, it also comes in editions designed to fit your specific needs. Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
related_products.features: Save time & grow your accounting practice with Acuity's self-service scheduling software. From the moment clients book with you, Acuity's there 24/7 to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule based on your availability, and process payments. With Acuity, your day runs more smoothly, even during tax season! Customize individual calendars for your staff and locations, and set up appointment types that keep clients coming back.

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one software for tax preparers, accountants and bookkeepers. Run your practice from a single, integrated hub.
related_products.features:
All-in-one software for tax preparers, accountants and bookkeepers.

Perfect for growing your business: stop paying a dozen tools and run your practice from a single, integrated hub.

Automated workflows, user-friendly client portal, customizable CRM, unlimited and secure file storage, e-signatures, messaging & more at the price of one app.

related_products.short_desc: Beautiful cloud-hosted online accounting software for accountants. Accessible anytime, anywhere.  Become a partner today!
related_products.features: Award-winning online accounting software designed for small business owners and accountants. Available on any computer or mobile device with an internet connection. Business finances and cashflow are updated in real time. Imports transactions from bank accounts. Unlimited user logins. Integrates with over 1,000 3rd-party business applications. Supports multiple currencies. Data is accessible through a single ledger, allowing accountants and clients to collaborate around finances.

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite brings your accounting practice to the next level by automating core processes reducing manual errors and processing time.
related_products.features: NetSuite supports your next-generation accounting business by streamlining your workflows and bringing full 360-degree visibility in real time to your company or practice. Many parts of the accounting process in an enterprise have specific requirements, and automation can reduce processing time and manual errors. NetSuite enables this automation with powerful tools configured in the GUI.

related_products.short_desc: BigTime is the engine empowering the greatest accounting firms on the planet to budget, track & bill their most important asset: time.
related_products.features: Accounting firms need more than just a timesheet. They need a system that unifies budgeting, project planning/execution, team communication, task management, resource management, invoicing and project financials. BigTime gives you the tools your team needs to deliver billable work on time and on budget, giving our customers an average improvement of 25% in gross margins and a substantial increase in expansion and referral revenue. "We didn't have to compromise or change the way we operated."

related_products.short_desc: CORE helps CPAs streamline their day-to-day with workflow management, simplified time tracking, and automated billing in one platform.
related_products.features: BQE CORE helps accounting firms streamline their day-to-day operations and boost utilization rates with workflow management, simplified time tracking, automated billing, scheduled reports, and business intelligence dashboards. This all-in-one platform provides full visibility of jobs and staff, so you can easily manage engagements while delivering more value to your clients. With greater control over your firm and access to critical insights, never miss a deadline again.

related_products.short_desc: The expense management and business card solution for precise control on company-wide spend
related_products.features: Divvy's 100% free expense platform is ideal for any accounting practice and their clientele. Divvy makes expense reports, receipt capturing and employee reimbursements an unnecessary thing of the past. Simply pick a budget, swipe your Divvy card and you're done. Everything finance needs is pushed to the cloud. Spend smarter, close books faster & travel better, without the hassles of saving receipts and reconciling. Divvy is free to use, plus earns 1x-7x rewards. See a demo, get up to $100.*

related_products.short_desc: Designed for accountants & bookkeepers. Manage clients, online scheduling, billing & invoicing, documents & more- all from one place.
related_products.features: vcita is complete business management platform designed for small businesses and accountants. Automate time-consuming admin tasks, so you can focus on running and growing your accounting practice. Manage your clients, online schedule, billing and payment collection, client communication and documents - all from one place. Let clients schedule meetings online from a branded client portal, 24/7, send appointment reminders and more. Streamline and simplify your billing and payment collection.

related_products.short_desc: OfficeTools helps your firm streamline day-to-day operations and work as a unified team.
related_products.features:
OfficeTools Workspace provides everything you need to run your tax and accounting practice from a single solution. 

Track projects from start to completion, organize client data, manage staff and tax workflow, and automate billing from one central dashboardall while integrating with the applications you use most.

OfficeTools Cloud is an all-in-one practice management solution that allows growing firms to automate their practice from a single, secure web-based application.

related_products.short_desc: Accounting practice management software built to empower accounting firms to spend more time helping their clients succeed.
related_products.features: Unclunk your accounting firm with Canopy's cloud-based practice management suite. It's client, document, workflow, time, billing, email, tax, and staff management. But that's a mouthful. Doing all of these things in one software eliminates switching and clicking, which will help you and your staff improve efficiency, organization, and accuracy. You'll even be able to help keep your clients efficient and organized with the client portal, automated reminders, eSign, payments, and more. Try Canopy!

similar_products.short_desc: Accounting practice management software built to empower accounting firms to spend more time helping their clients succeed.
similar_products.features: Unclunk your accounting firm with Canopy's cloud-based practice management suite. It's client, document, workflow, time, billing, email, tax, and staff management. But that's a mouthful. Doing all of these things in one software eliminates switching and clicking, which will help you and your staff improve efficiency, organization, and accuracy. You'll even be able to help keep your clients efficient and organized with the client portal, automated reminders, eSign, payments, and more. Try Canopy!

similar_products.short_desc: Practice management for accountants with expense tracking, staff time reporting, cash receipts handling, and client management tools.
similar_products.features: Time and billing software that offers expense tracking, staff time reporting, cash receipts handling, and client management tools.

similar_products.short_desc: The leading commerce and client engagement platform for accounting and professional service firms. Integrates proposals, billing + more
similar_products.features: The leading commerce and client engagement platform for accounting and professional service firms. Create and track proposals with built in contracts and engagement letters (terms), bill clients with variable payment options (recurring, one time, etc.) and get important business insights all in one place. Integrates with Intuit, Intuit Quickbooks, Xero, Gusto, Zapier and more Accounting Practice Management solutions to automate workflow effortlessly.

similar_products.short_desc:
Get More Done With Firm360.

Save time and money with this all-in-one accounting management platform-the visibility you need.
similar_products.features:
Streamline your accounting practice and increase your firm's productivity. Save your staff an average of 10 hours a week in wasted non-billable time in 30 days. Firm360 creates client management, project management, billing, reporting, and time management transparency.

Save your firm time and money by replacing your current 5+ software solutions with one seamless experience. 

This all-in-one cloud-based platform is everything you need to get the job done!

similar_products.short_desc: BigTime is the engine empowering the greatest accounting firms on the planet to budget, track & bill their most important asset: time.
similar_products.features: Accounting firms need more than just a timesheet. They need a system that unifies budgeting, project planning/execution, team communication, task management, resource management, invoicing and project financials. BigTime gives you the tools your team needs to deliver billable work on time and on budget, giving our customers an average improvement of 25% in gross margins and a substantial increase in expansion and referral revenue. "We didn't have to compromise or change the way we operated."

similar_products.short_desc: Pixie works for accounting and bookkeeping firms using it to centralise tasks, deadlines, documents and emails and automate workflows.
similar_products.features:
Pixie helps you get your accounting or bookkeeping practice running like clockwork. 

Its powerful workflow automation means you and your team will spend less time doing manual admin. 

Its flexible CRM allows you to centralise client details alongside the email and document timeline. 

Lastly, Pixie's world-class support will help you hit the ground running and successfully implement Pixie at your practice.

similar_products.short_desc: Scale your accounting firm with one easy-to-use solution. Track client work, collaborate with your staff, and hit your deadlines.
similar_products.features: Everything your firm needs to scale in one easy to use solution. Manage your staff, track client deadlines, automate client-data collection, track time, invoice your clients, and store all your client information in one place!

similar_products.short_desc: Melio is a simple bill-pay service for accountants and businesses. Manage all your clients' payments & pay any business bill for free.
similar_products.features: Melio is a simple online bill-pay management tool tailored to accountants, bookkeepers, and their small business clients. Manage all clients' payments from a single dashboard with one login for all client accounts. Pay business bill for free via bank transfer or credit card, even where cards are not accepted. Set up a payment approval workflow, add users, and manage roles and permissions in a few clicks. Save time and eliminate dual data entry with our 2-way sync with QuickBooks..

similar_products.short_desc: Designed for accountants & bookkeepers. Manage clients, online scheduling, billing & invoicing, documents & more- all from one place.
similar_products.features: vcita is complete business management platform designed for small businesses and accountants. Automate time-consuming admin tasks, so you can focus on running and growing your accounting practice. Manage your clients, online schedule, billing and payment collection, client communication and documents - all from one place. Let clients schedule meetings online from a branded client portal, 24/7, send appointment reminders and more. Streamline and simplify your billing and payment collection.

similar_products.short_desc: Do you want an effective way to track your tax return list but the options out there just weren't quite built for the tax process?
similar_products.features: Do you want an effective way to track your tax return list but the options out there seem a bit...complicated? At TaxFlow, we built software specifically to organize your tax return list, because tax preparers need something better than spreadsheets that doesn't break the bank. If your looking for an upgrade from spreadsheets but don't want to learn or pay for an overload of features you don't use, then TaxFlow is for you.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate, Customize & Simplify Ur accounting practice workflows using Athena, will save you time, money and will organize Ur Practice!!
similar_products.features: Automate and customize your practice using  Athena Workflow, is an Accounting Practice Management Software aimed to simplify the accounting firm's workflow. It is your task management solution designed to simplify your life by saving you time, money and organizing your practice. Each job, task & delegation in this software allows you to have the confidence of being able to carry out your work in a timely manner & real time, which will meet the needs of each company.

similar_products.short_desc: CORE helps CPAs streamline their day-to-day with workflow management, simplified time tracking, and automated billing in one platform.
similar_products.features: BQE CORE helps accounting firms streamline their day-to-day operations and boost utilization rates with workflow management, simplified time tracking, automated billing, scheduled reports, and business intelligence dashboards. This all-in-one platform provides full visibility of jobs and staff, so you can easily manage engagements while delivering more value to your clients. With greater control over your firm and access to critical insights, never miss a deadline again.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounts Payable software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounts Payable tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounts Payable software automates the process of controlling cash expenditures. These applications help improve cash management and reduce effort by tracking invoices, providing tools for capturing errors, and generating reports. Accounts Payable solutions are designed to work with General Ledger and Accounting applications. Accounts Payable software is related to Accounting software and Billing and Invoicing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounts Receivable software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounts Receivable tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounts Receivable software deals with money that is owed to an organization. It automates the recording of payments on outstanding invoices and provides reports on collection and aging. Along with reports, Accounts Receivable applications generate monthly customer statements and collection letters. Accounts Receivable solutions integrate with Accounting software. Accounts Receivable software is related to Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Auto Dealer Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Auto Dealer Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Auto Dealer Accounting software streamlines revenue and expense tracking and tax reporting for auto dealers.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Bookkeeper tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Bookkeeper software helps small and mid-size businesses keep track of their financial data.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Church Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Church Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Church Accounting software provides ministries specialized tools for church bookkeeping. It can be used for fund accounting, donation tracking, and payroll management. Churches often use accounting software to manage expenses and provide accurate financial reporting for their congregations. Church Accounting software is closely related to Accounting software, and Nonprofit software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction accounting software automates accounting, job costing and loan servicing functions for the construction, architecture, and engineering industries. Construction accounting software offer comprehensive management and reporting tools for construction breakdowns, budgets, expenditures, change orders, cost-over-runs and completion progress. Additionally, construction accounting provides standard monthly accounting available from your traditional construction accounting system. Accounting software is related to Construction Estimating software, Construction CRM software and Construction Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Financial Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Financial Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Financial Reporting software automates the task of reporting an organization's financial results, status and transactions. Financial Reporting applications help organizations control and increase operational efficiencies. These solutions provide the ability to collect, translate and consolidate data from various systems and geographic locations. Financial Reporting software is related to Accounting software, Budgeting software, Business Performance Management software and Compliance software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Financial Services software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Financial Services tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Financial Services software is used to manage day to day operations of banks, credit unions, and other organizations that provide financial services to businesses and the general public.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fund Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fund Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fund Accounting software automates accounting and portfolio management functions for nonprofit organizations, alternative asset managers, private bankers, foundations and government agencies. Fund administrators utilize these applications to assist in strategic decision making and to increase accountability across an organization's financial operations. Fund Accounting software also assists with regulatory compliance management and financial reporting on portfolio performance. Fund Accounting software is related to Accounting software and Government software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lease Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lease Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lease Accounting software enables companies to manage their lease portfolio and comply with current lease accounting standards.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit Accounting software helps non-commercial organizations track grants and donations and report on how these funds are being spent.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Professional Services Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Professional Services Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Professional Services Automation (PSA) software enables the tracking, planning, management and billing of services provided by independent contractors and services organizations. Professional Services Automation applications help to streamline individual projects, prevent loss of revenue and slow billing cycles and manage governance. PSA solutions give an overall view of finances, operations and client relationships, enabling a more efficient organization. Professional Services Automation software is related to Project Management software, Time and Expense software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Tax software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Tax tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Tax software manages the calculation, collection, and reporting of state and local taxes on sales of goods and services while maintaining compliance with various local and federal regulations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top School Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of School Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: School Accounting software automates accounting, financial operations and other back office functions for educational institutions. These applications are specifically designed for the budgetary needs of school management and typically include tools for: accounting, billing, accounts payable, purchasing and payroll into a single administrative tool. School Accounting software is related to School Administration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Tax Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Tax Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Tax Practice Management software is used by accounting and tax firms for managing their day to day activities such as streamlining tax preparation and tax resolution.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Trust Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Trust Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Trust Accounting software allows administrators to manage trusts, estates and investment portfolios. Trust Accounting solutions can be used by bank trust departments, accountants, law firms, non-profit organizations and independent trust companies and helps to keep administrators in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. Trust Accounting software is related to Accounting software, Fund Accounting software, Law Practice Management software, Investment Management software and Legal Billing software.

category_features.definition: Break tasks down into individual components. Assign users/dates to subtasks.

category_features.name: Gantt/Timeline View
category_features.definition: Coordinates and illustrates a project's benchmarks and dependencies

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Percent-Complete Tracking
category_features.definition: Level of completion within a task

category_features.name: Recurring Tasks
category_features.definition: Set a task to repeat

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Spreadsheet View
category_features.definition: UI looks like a spreadsheet

category_features.name: Task Board View
category_features.definition: UI looks like task board

category_features.name: Time Tracking
category_features.definition: Measure time to completion or hours worked

category_features.name: To-Do List
category_features.definition: UI looks like a physical to do list

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Business Process Automation
category_features.definition: Improve the management of information, tasks, and procedures by establishing routines and patterns associated with processes

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share muliple calendars

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Customizable Dashboard
category_features.definition: Alter the layout and content of dashboards

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Forms Management
category_features.definition: Organize, store and distribute forms and form templates in a centralized location

category_features.name: Graphical Workflow Editor
category_features.definition: Create, design and modify the flow and processes of tasks in a project

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: No-Code
category_features.definition: Drag and drop/visual interfaces that allow non-tech users to build without writing code

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Third Party Integrations
category_features.definition: Improve business process by accessing more features and applications by combining third party integrations

category_features.name: Workflow Configuration
category_features.definition: Alter the default workflow to meet your organization's needs

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is where project management happens. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered.

related_products.short_desc: Trello is an intuitive project management tool that creates a shared perspective for your team across the entirety of any project.
related_products.features: Trello is an intuitively simple project management tool, built so users can spend more time getting things done and less time learning how to use this tool. Teams that use Trello can easily organize their work and manage projects from beginning to end: assign tasks, manage due dates, attach files, create checklists, and more. With over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira, and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub for cross-team collaboration.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by millions, Basecamp puts everything you need to get work done in one place.
related_products.features: 89% of our customers say they have a better handle on their business since switching to Basecamp. It bring *everything* you're working together with *all* the tools teams need to get projects done: to-do lists, message boards, schedules, documents & file storage, and group chat. Everyone will know what to do. Nothing will slip through the cracks. You'll always know exactly whats going on.

related_products.short_desc: Jira Software is the project management tool for agile teams, customizable for any type of project.
related_products.features: Jira Software is the project management tool for agile teams, customizable for any type of project. Teams can start with a project template or create their own custom workflow. Jira issues, also known as tasks, tracks each piece of work that passes through the workflow steps to completion. Jira's automation engine enables teams to easily automate tasks and processes. With all project information in one place, reports can also be generated to track progress, productivity and ensure nothing slips.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
related_products.features: Asana is a project management tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

related_products.short_desc: GitHub enables development teams to collaborate, and review and manage code within a DevOps pipeline and built-in code security.
related_products.features: GitHub is where the world builds software. Millions of individuals, organizations and businesses around the world use GitHub to discover, share, and contribute software. Developers at startups to Fortune 50 companies use GitHub, every step of the way.

related_products.short_desc: Manage projects with time tracking, scheduling, budgeting, planning and reporting options in one software available across devices.
related_products.features: Overseeing progress of a project, tracking employees' workload, budgeting and tracking time spent is simple with Clockify. There are no limits on the number of users, projects or time tracking periods. You can invite an infinite number of users to your workspace, approve timesheets & manage schedules. Create invoices, track expenses, control budgets and hourly rates. Generate customized reports, export and share them with clients. Track leaves and holidays and approve time off for your employees

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the world's leading project management tool with fully customizable and proprietary features that make it a must-have.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Manage all of your team's projects in one place with monday.com--customizable software that adapts to your organization's needs.
related_products.features: Manage all of your team's projects in one place with monday.com. From simple tasks to complex portfolios, this all-in-one software solution allows you to build your team's perfect collaboration tools. Then integrate your other tools; visualize data in calendar, Gantt, or Kanban views; and automate your manual processes. So you can truly take control of all of your workflows.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Confluence makes project management easier. Keep track of milestones and timelines all in one place.
related_products.features: Confluence makes Project Management easier. Use it to track your most complex tasks, keep stakeholders in the loop, and collaborate with all participating team members.  Confluence pages help track project milestones in an organized and concise way. Work better, together with Confluence.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkOtter is "Your #1 Rated PPM for Usability in 2022" - Garnter.  Gantt, Kanban, Resource Mgt, JIRA Sync, MSP Sync, & Magic Dashboards
similar_products.features:
WorkOtter is "the #1 Rated Project & Resource Management Solution for Usability: ~ Gartner May 2022. 

Best for PMOs of 10 or more in Engineering/IT/Innovation ready to move from spreadsheets to easy SaaS project, resource, and portfolios maangement. 

Differentiator:  Unlike Monday, Smartsheet, and Planview you can plan resources at the project level (vs Task).

Top Features: Magic Dashboards, Portfolios (with What-If), Intake, Projects (Gantt/Kanban), Time, Capacity Planning, and Financials.

similar_products.features: Asana is a project management tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

similar_products.short_desc: Wrike is versatile project management software for any team, with templates, Gantt charts, automated requests and reports, and more.
similar_products.features: Tackle complex projects with Wrike's award-winning project management software. Break projects into simple steps, assign tasks to team members, and visualize progress with Gantt charts, Kanban boards, and calendars. Manage resource allocation and forecasting with software that's easy to launch. Automation and AI features strip away time-consuming admin tasks so you can do the best work of your life. Streamline your practices, align your team, and ensure you hit deadlines and stay on budget.

similar_products.short_desc: Jira Software is the project management tool for agile teams, customizable for any type of project.
similar_products.features: Jira Software is the project management tool for agile teams, customizable for any type of project. Jira's automation engine enables teams to easily automate tasks and processes. With all project information in one place, reports can also be generated to track progress, productivity and ensure nothing slips.

similar_products.short_desc: Buildertrend is the No. 1 construction project management software, trusted by homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors.
similar_products.features: Buildertrend is the No. 1, cloud-based construction project management software for homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors. Since 2006, we have empowered the construction industry with a better way to build. More than 1 million users across the globe have chosen Buildertrend as their platform for real-time collaboration. Our software helps construction professionals complete projects while reducing delays, eliminating communication errors and increasing customer satisfaction.

similar_products.short_desc: Quickbase is a no-code operational agility platform that enables organizations to improve operations through insights and automation.
similar_products.features: Quickbase is the easiest way to manage projects in the cloud no matter what the project is or where your teams are. Quickbase's flexible no-code platform gives you all the features you need to assign tasks, automate workflows, and generate insightful reports for even the most complex projects.

similar_products.short_desc: A completely reimagined UI, enhanced search and filters, easywork allocation, new portfolio dashboard, and more to transform your work.
similar_products.features:
Zoho Projects is a cloud based project management software with over 200,000 customers worldwide. It helps you plan your projects, and execute them with perfection. 

With Projects, you can assign tasks easily, communicate effectively with both your team and clients, be informed on all project updates, get detailed reports on work progress and deliver projects on time, everytime.

similar_products.short_desc: Trello is an intuitive project management tool that creates a shared perspective for your team across the entirety of any project.
similar_products.features: Trello is an intuitively simple project management tool, built so users can spend more time getting things done and less time learning how to use this tool. Teams that use Trello can easily organize their work and manage projects from beginning to end: assign tasks, manage due dates, attach files, create checklists, and more. With over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira, and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub for cross-team collaboration.

similar_products.short_desc: The collaborative work management leader, helping companies plan, execute, and deliver great work and exceptional customer experiences.
similar_products.features: Adobe Workfront is a collaborative work management solution that addresses the challenges of disconnected teams, siloed tools, and the relentless pace of enterprise work. With Workfront, organizations can manage projects and portfolios with precision using features like task and resource management, capacity planning, Gantt charts, and time tracking. This enables teams to set and meet expectations while minimizing effort, eliminating redundancies, and optimizing delivery on time and budget.

similar_products.short_desc: Visual Planning is a full-scale  Project Management platform configured with project managers in mind. Sign up for a free demo!
similar_products.features: Visual Planning is a full-scale scheduling and project management platform configured with project managers in mind. Monitor employee capacities/skillsets, project statuses, tasks & more with Visual Planning's popular scheduling tools.  Oversee reports, projects, and resources across all devices for a collaborative management platform. Tailor a solution that meets your company's needs.  Sign up for a free custom demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: BigTime is the engine empowering the greatest consulting firms on the planet to budget, track & bill their most important asset: time.
similar_products.features: **Leader in Project Management Software by G2** Track the things that are important to you. Deep dive into project tasks and budgets. Check the status of tasks by due dates, staff assignments and more. If you're operating blind, real-time visibility is a few clicks away and exactly the way you want to see it. "We looked everywhere...nothing beats BigTime" - Matt M.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Client Onboarding software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Client Onboarding tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Client Onboarding Software (also known as Customer Onboarding Software) brings clients through the process of learning and implementing a recently purchased product or service.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Idea Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Idea Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Idea Management software provides all employees or members of an organization with a platform for sharing ideas to benefit the organizational mission. This type of software allows companies to solicit information and encourage a collaborative environment for employees. Additionally, vendors, partners, customers and investors can share ideas, allowing companies to collect, sort, and evaluate ideas from the outside workforce, often with strategic goals in mind. Idea Management software is related to Project Management software, Workflow Management software, and Task Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Project Management software is used by corporate IT teams and project managers to track task assignments, expenses, and progress of application development, maintenance, and deployment.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Professional Services Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Professional Services Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Professional Services Automation (PSA) software enables the tracking, planning, management and billing of services provided by independent contractors and services organizations. Professional Services Automation applications help to streamline individual projects, prevent loss of revenue and slow billing cycles and manage governance. PSA solutions give an overall view of finances, operations and client relationships, enabling a more efficient organization. Professional Services Automation software is related to Project Management software, Time and Expense software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Portfolio Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Portfolio Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Portfolio Management software makes it easier for project mangers and organizations to analyze and manage numerous projects simultaneously. Project Portfolio Management software helps you allocate resources across projects, and collaborate between project teams. It is designed to help administrators collectively monitor project goals and view reports for multiple projects in one place. Other categories related to Project Portfolio Management software include Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Resource Management software, and Task Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Requirements Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Requirements Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Requirements Management software helps companies align practical needs with IT functionality during the systems development or upgrade process. By managing system requirements, companies can shorten development time and optimize the quality of their systems. Requirements Management software usually covers hardware, software, functional, operational, interface, business and security requirements. Requirements Management software is related to Workflow Management software, Server Management software, Project Management software, Website Monitoring software, and Business Process Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Resource Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Resource Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Resource Management software helps project planners allocate program resources. Project managers often use Resource Management software to analyze resource demand and capacity, to create predictive project forecasting. Businesses looking for Resource Management software may also be interested in Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, and Project Portfolio Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Task Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Task Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Task Management software allows groups of users to work together more cohesively to quickly and thoroughly complete projects. Features such as time tracking and project tracking ensure that all project tasks are covered and progress reports are up to date. Other functions include automatic time budgeting and timeline, email syncing, to-do list creation, collaborative interfaces for all users, and task reminders. Task Management software is related to Project Management software, Idea Management software, Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Team Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Team Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Team Management software utilizes integrated communication capabilities and project/task management functionality to assist managers with improving collaboration, communication, and productivity within teams and team-related projects, whether remotely or in the office.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time and Expense software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time and Expense tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time and Expense software automates the tracking of billable hours and reimbursement expenses. Time and Expense solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time and Expense applications can also be used for expense reporting by employees who travel frequently. Time and Expense software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time Tracking software automates the tracking of billable hours. Time Tracking solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time Tracking software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

pricing_plans.name: Team
pricing_plans.description: The plan is billed annually. When billed monthly, the plan costs $75/month.

pricing_plans.name: Business
pricing_plans.description: The plan is billed annually. When billed monthly, the plan costs $99/month.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise
pricing_plans.description: Contact the company for custom pricing. The plan is best for enterprise teams of 50+.
